mapper.sql: PKID, CASE_CODE, PART_CODE, IS_PERCHASE_RESERACH_NEED, IS_LOAN_CLOSE, COMMENT
mapper.insert:
insert into sctrans.T_TO_FIRST_FOLLOW
PKID,
CASE_CODE,
PART_CODE,
IS_PERCHASE_RESERACH_NEED,
IS_LOAN_CLOSE,
COMMENT,
,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isPerchaseReserachNeed,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{isLoanClose,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{comment,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
,GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID}
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_FIRST_FOLLOW
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PERCHASE_RESERACH_NEED = #{isPerchaseReserachNeed,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_LOAN_CLOSE = #{isLoanClose,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID},
,IS_ACTIVE='1' where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from sctrans.T_TO_FIRST_FOLLOW where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update sctrans.T_TO_FIRST_FOLLOW set IS_PERCHASE_RESERACH_NEED=#{isPerchaseReserachNeed,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_LOAN_CLOSE=#{isLoanClose,jdbcType=CHAR},IS_ACTIVE='1', UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
